Regulation Name(s): Alkaline phosphatase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche ALP IFCC Gen.2 colorimetric reagent for quantitative measurement of alkaline phosphatase in human serum and plasma
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro test intended for the quantitative determination of the catalytic activity of alkaline phosphatase in human serum and plasma on COBAS INTEGRA systems, used for diagnosis and treatment of liver, bone, parathyroid, and intestinal diseases
